verbs.description: [ARG1: russian troll farm] [V: targeted] [ARG2: in arson attack] the office of a russian internet troll farm linked to election interference efforts by russia government during the 2016 presidential election was set on fire in an arson attack early tuesday morning according to reports the times rbc information systems arson federal news agency rbc special counsel robert mueller the moscow times attack editor vladimir putin internet research agency yevgeny prigozhin russia st petersberg yevgeny zubarev
